Package controllers

Class customer_controller

java.lang.Object
controllers.customer_controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class customer_controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the customer.fxml file. Handles all user input and data manipulation for the Customer view.
Author:
Arun Rai

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      This method initializes the Add Customer/Modify page with country and first-level division data from the database. It sets the primary key text box to the next available primary key for Customers. It adds the country names to the country_box and sets the prompt text to "Select country first". When a country is selected from the country_box, it clears the first_level_box and sets it to visible. It creates an ObservableList of first-level divisions for the selected country and adds them to the first_level_box. If a blank space is selected, it clears the first_level_box and hides it, and sets the selectCountryBox to visible.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - a URL representing the location of the FXML file.
      rb - a ResourceBundle representing the localized resources for the root object.

    • clickedCancelCustomerButton

      void clickedCancelCustomerButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Close the customer fxml file and return user to home page without saving any data.
      Parameters:
      event - the event triggered by clicking the "Cancel" button

    • closeRequestHandler

      public void closeRequestHandler(javafx.stage.WindowEvent event)
      If page is closed by clicking "X" on top right it will execute this code, which will close the window and return the user to home page without saving any data.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by clicking "X" on top right of window.

    • loadCustomerData

      public void loadCustomerData(Customer customer)
      When modify button is clicked from home page, it loads the selected customer data through this method
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer object to be loaded

    • clickedSaveButton

      void clickedSaveButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the user clicks the save button, program will collect all data in text fields and combo boxes. It will then pass the data to methods in the class "inputcheck" and verify if the data is valid. If all the data is valid and the page is has title "Add Customer" it will insert a new row into the customers table in the client_schedule database, else if the title is "Modify Customer" it will update the row with the matching Customer_ID and return the user to home page.If the data is not valid than it will remain on the customer page, not insert or update any data and notify the user with error messages of how they can correct their data inputs.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the user clicking the "Save" button.
